title: NYK orders two LNG-fuelled bulkers at Oshima
dc:creator: Sam Chambers
description: Nippon Yusen Kaisha (NYK) will order two LNG-fuelled large coal carriers from Oshima Shipbuilding. The 95,000 dwt vessels are scheduled to be delivered in 2025. NYK said in a release today it is positioning LNG fuel as a bridge solution until future zero-emission ships can be realised. The company ordered the world’s first LNG-fuelled large …
